comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on January 24, 2023, 05:31:38 PMHello fellas bettors, I have some good opportunities to offer you.Everybody with some spare time and will are very welcome.Don't worry I don't look for anything upfront.For more info please contact me on telegram.Lets make some money.@BookiedownWhy you are not providing more info here? If your post here then everyone who visits this link will be able to know the details. But on telegram only few people will be able to know as only few people may send pm to you. But if you post details on here then many people might be interested on your project.

If your post here then everyone who visits this link will be able to know the details. But on telegram only few people will be able to know as only few people may send pm to you. But if you post details on here then many people might be interested on your project.You are absolute right, for example one of thing is to register on one famous bookie (A+) with small deposit and recive 100$ for free without any wagering requirements, second is one well known book which have casino bonus which is really easy to finish in one day and lock in with 300$ in profit, and third is in my opinion best one and it concerns one very well know crypto sportsbook which is present in this forum too, so I wouldn’t go too much in details all I can say I know how to beat them, take money from them and I can prove it.Just to be clear I am not talking about some fixed shit or bugs or something like that.there is seriously a site that after a "small deposit" (which amount?) provide 100USD without wagering requirements? KYC?about the second site, these kinds of bonus are interesting but doesn't provide any "sure" win.... the third one sound fishy or at least like a scam...  What you earn on that offers? or are you requiring some tips ?I think it's better you get some vouch by trusted members. I could be interested in test your methods but only if these are not scams or similar....

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Vague offer. Promises to make money. You have to deposit funds. Telegram contact. Assuring they have a special system to beat the casino…This is like a post to see how many red flags can be presented. No sane person would jump at an offer like this, but I assume it’s an offer looking for desperate people willing to try anything to make a buck as they are likely the easiest scam targets. Be safe out there. There is no substitute for putting in the work.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Too many red flags in one single post.Just an advice to anyone who may feel curious enough to contact OP: Do not give anyone your money nor let them to fool you with "guaranteed returns".To be honest, some moderator should lock this thread, does not add anything of value around here.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: This is very interesting OP. You did not give us proper update on your offer for which you created this topic as to properly make us understand very well. You made me feel skeptical of this offer and I will be sincerely saying this, these are the ways scammers do their work, you might have good intentions but the way and manner at which your offer was presented does not portray it as genuine. One would look at it and say this is another scammer wanting telegram users to begin spamming. This post does not show any sign of seriousness from you as the OP and if you can see from other comments, it is likely no one would reach out to you for further information as you did not really put it clear here and  you should be contacted when no proper information on your offer.I would advise any one dealing to be cautious  while dealing.

comments.author: White pawn
comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on January 25, 2023, 09:04:22 AMOne more thing, if a trusted member confirms all my allegations will I get a public apology from you who have already declared me as scammer ?No one has proclaimed you a scammer, Yet. If you’re being honest and real, you would admit that your original post is vague. Claiming to have got some good opportunities without actually stating anything. It’s a no brainer on why people would be inclined to think what you’re offering to be a scam.

Are we only supposed to make deposits and earn profits?

comments.author: Maslate
comments.body: All I need is just a little info, then let's see what I can do. Come on, everyone wants a good opportunity, but no one would waste their time if that opportunity is not legitimate.

comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on January 25, 2023, 12:15:20 PMQuote from: Maslate on January 25, 2023, 12:09:39 PMAll I need is just a little info, then let's see what I can do. Come on, everyone wants a good opportunity, but no one would waste their time if that opportunity is not legitimate.  If you can afforf to lose 5 mins of your time contact me on telegram @Bookiedown , I will give you details then you decide is it for you or not Fair enough ?Can you just DM me here?

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on January 25, 2023, 09:04:22 AMOne more thing, if a trusted member confirms all my allegations will I get a public apology from you who have already declared me as scammer ?I have been on forums for a long time and have seen many offers like yours that always end up in one of two ways: scammed or nothing. I don't red tag you myself because I have no proof that you are consciously trying to scam anyone but your offer sounds like creep to me.
